title: (x) Smythson of Bond Street logo geometric sans - custom designed {Stephen}
author: neumattias

comments.content:
I agree it's probably custom, but [Neutraface Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20120621213708/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfontspecimens) includes most of these letterforms. For example, the splayed M is an alternate character. The Y is also more like the sample.

- Mike Yanega

[ITC Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20120621213708/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=1&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=Blair&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=smythson) and [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120621213708/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/) are close, too.

Invert the "W" to form an "M" to get closer still.

David Thometz
Luxury Gold by House Industries is pretty close.
